title: Supercharge Any USB Port!
description: ICYMI -  uCharger -   Here's a cool little contraption that speeds up the charge time for various devices while charging via computer / laptop. Also cool, it's only $10 bucks!  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -

I stumbled upon on Amazon, it is called, "UCharger". Essentially, it allows you to charge up devices from your laptop's USB port, that you woulden't otherwise be able to charge from those ports Like an iPad or a tablet.
